BasicStoneMason.description: Unlocks the stonemason, which can make stone bricks.
BasicStoneMason.name: Stonemason

Fletcher.description: Unlocks the fletcher, which makes ammo.
Fletcher.name: Fletcher

CopperWorker.description: Unlocks the copper worker, which specialises in working with copper.
CopperWorker.name: Copper Worker

ToolCrafter.description: Unlocks the tool crafter, which makes tools.
ToolCrafter.name: Tool Crafter

BrickMaker.description: Unlocks the brick maker, which makes bricks.
BrickMaker.name: Brick Maker

IronAnvil.description: Unlocks the iron anvil, which is better than the bronze anvil.
IronAnvil.name: Iron Anvil

SteelAnvil.description: Unlocks the steel anvil, which is better than the iron anvil.
SteelAnvil.name: Steel Anvil
